website_summaries.verdict: A built-in flashlight helps you find potential hazards before they become a problem. The base isn't as stable as other styles, but you can change it out for another type.
pros: LED light built into ergonomic hand grip for easier location of trip hazards
Collapsible cane supports up to 250 pounds
Slip-resistant rubber tip, but compatible with other tip types
cons: May not adjust small enough for shorter people to use comfortably
The flashlight could break if you were to drop the cane

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: What I liked most was that the package arrived on time and rather quickly. I didn’t like the fact that I had to reorder the item twice and both times there were missing items. Did not receive travel pouch as advertised
customer_reviews.author: LATONYA C. HOWARD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cane with a a poorly designed flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great product with some big flaws. It's lightweight, compactable, sturdy cane. I ended up using the flashlight a lot more than I expected to. Unfortunately, it's the flashlight that was the flaw. The beam is super narrow, so you have to point right at something if you want to see it. Not the best when you're using the cane it's attached to to keep you upright. Also the flashlight flickers in and out, sometimes necessitating a good hard whomp to turn back on. The flashlight ultimately stopped working altogether. Otherwise, this is a great cane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light on this cane is very useful at night or in dark areas.
customer_reviews.text: This cane is very sturdy. It works well with the optional tripod tip to make it self standing. I use the light a lot more than I thought I would. Because I have a winter home I decided I needed a cane for each home. When I went to buy one I found they were unavailable so I bought a look alike Ranger5 cane and was very disappointed. It was priced about the same and looked just like the Vive cane but it wasn't stable, wouldn't stand on it's own on carpet and was difficult to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard on holiday

customer_reviews.title: Hits all the marks
customer_reviews.text: soft comfortable handle..height adjustment 33.5" to 37.5" actual..easy to take apart..terrific little light..very handy...quality materials...4 stars because of a minor flaw...some minimal flexing between segments when under pressure of walking...noted as bending, but still very sturdy...this may or may not loosen more over time...we'll see...overall great value
customer_reviews.author: A Cohen

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my aunt in romania and she loves it, it's easy to use, lightweight, doesnt make noise (this was a big complaint with the one she had) it also doesnt slip at all (the one she had would slip on slick surfaces), she also liked the flashlight a lot, i tested it out too before sending it to her and its pretty bright! overall she was very happy and loves and because of that i wanna let people know that its a good product and thank you for having such a good product at such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Simion

customer_reviews.title: It is a very safe cane.  I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cane. It is a wide base quad cane that can stand on it's own. The amazing thing about it is that it has a light in the handle. You can point it straight ahead of down to the ground for safer walking. It is also very easy to fold up and put into a suitcase when you travel. So, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sharen Sleater

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cane but flashlight button broke after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cane. We have a steep, unlit stairway down to our apartment building and a sloped surface that leads to our door. This light on the cane was handy to use for that purpose. It also helped when i needed a light to put my key in the door. Unfortunately, the button on the flashlight stopped working less than three months after I purchased it and 4 days after the window to return it ended. The reason I purchased thiz cane was for the flashlight feature. Now it's just another cane. I would love to have given it a five star rating but cannot due to the flashlight feature breaking after so little time.
customer_reviews.author: Debee

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cane 2-3 weeks ago. I broke my femur and I needed something reliable after I used a walker to go anywhere. This cane lasted 1 week. The pole started detaching from the handle and I need this thing to get anywhere INCLUDING up and down stairs. I can't use this thing and I'm only 165-170lbs even though the description says it can handle 250lbs. This product is not okay to use as a reliable, day to day cane.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: A handy walking cane with light, lightweight, folds
customer_reviews.text: My husband is really pleased with this. It has a light and is easy to set up. It folds, opens easily, locks in place, and is adjustable. The only thing that might improve it is the ability to make the light adjustable so it can change between looking at the ground, straight in front, and anges.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D. Krug

customer_reviews.title: Cane works but two issues...
customer_reviews.text: Cane seems sturdy, however the one I received did not include the nylon pouch that it was supposed to come with nor does the flashlight work (I tried replacing batteries, still nothing). On a positive note, it folds easily and extends/opens easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It bowed when I leaned on it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it's got a soft bag to carry it when folded. I also liked the built in flashlight. I'm tall, 6'1", and with the cane fully extended, it tends to bow when you lean on it. I'm not confident in the support it will provide, I'm returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy G

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight came with easily breakable light.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not too sturdy. Easy to open and fold up. Great light which was main reason I chose this brand. However, on both canes I bought, the light broke off quite soon after I got it. So the main reason for selecting this came was negated.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight design, erratic light
customer_reviews.text: I weigh close to 300 lbs fully clothed. The cane has not failed but seems a bit flimsy for my bulk. It's handy to break down but the real problem is the light. It comes on when it wants to and stays on until it wants to go off. Irritating. Too much trouble to return. I like the shape and feel of the handle but wish I could depend on the light.
customer_reviews.author: William Vaughn--Author, Mentor, Ham, Dad

customer_reviews.title: Look, price, & quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived on time in excellent condition and was everything that I expected, great product, love the way it folds and the LED light is a wonderful added feature, thanks for this available product and the lifetime warranty that’s added to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Clamp falls off
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight for sure. That is the only good part. It is hard to open and close, but more importantly there is a piece of hard plastic that is supposed to clamp onto the cane where it holds the can shut when closed. But the piece of plastic falls off and then you cannot find it!!! Very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.text: I give 2 stars to the fact that the item came without the non slip rubber tip. I write to see if they can send it and its not possible. Cant replace because i send it as a gift to a relative out of country. They couldnt just send the missing piece, so now is useless to the person i give this.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Coming out of back surgery, I needed a support cane. This fit the bill and then some. Love the light, love the handle and sturdiness and support. What I don’t like is the clip for the leash. Not a problem. It’s a great light weight cane and made well.
customer_reviews.author: TunaChick

customer_reviews.title: Light your way!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the lighted cane yet. I plan to use it on vacation where there may not be sufficient light to find the bathroom at night. I checked it out. It works. I like the fold-up feature for packing.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Kostisin

customer_reviews.title: Feels good but.
customer_reviews.text: The cane feels good and the light works great but the wrist strap is too small, I don't have big hands and still have to struggle to slip my hand into it. Otherwise would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: This cane is beautiful. The handle is soft and feels good on ...
customer_reviews.text: This cane is beautiful. The handle is soft and feels good on your hand. It is very easy to fold up and unfold. We bought this to bring on a cruise ship and carry in our back pack in case needed on a long walk into town when we dock at a port to explore.
customer_reviews.author: silring

customer_reviews.title: Cane with light
customer_reviews.text: “A handy cane for people needing to move around in the dark. The addition of a flashlight built into the handle is a brilliant idea.”
customer_reviews.author: VP Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so stiff
customer_reviews.text: Good item, but didn’t work for me. Light didn’t work & item was diffective. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Chris m

customer_reviews.title: Good product and practical
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an elderly friend because it had the light features and was light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love the light!
customer_reviews.text: This cane is so handy with the light when we go to a movie and head down the steps. Hubby also uses it at night. This is a great cane.
customer_reviews.author: JoEri

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: For being so light weight this cane is pretty sturdy. And the LED light in the handle is a nice feature. The bag that comes with it makes it nice for my wife to put in her bag. She is only 5' and this cane does not adjust for someone that short, but it took five minutes to pull off the rubber foot and cut off a few inches with a hacksaw. It's perfect for her now.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cane
customer_reviews.text: Nice cane, doesn’t rattle when walking , sturdy. When it is folded up it tends to pop open again, so I use a sturdy rubber band to keep it folded. Comes with a nice black case.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Only Darkness
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (1) of these but received (2). I figured they sent (2) because the flashlight quality is sketchy and only (1) was functioning. That was alright until the functioning light went out after a day or two. Other than that, the cane was great. Light and surprisingly sturdy for a folding cane.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grafton

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it would be nice if it come in colors or had aglow in the dark strip so it is noticable at nite,. I put the rubber for leg on the bottom so it will stand. I like it
customer_reviews.author: carol jellison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cane
customer_reviews.text: Only draw back is the height adjustments. I feel like it should be taller.
customer_reviews.author: Gentlemanintraining

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cane for an elderly woman
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my elderly mother for a plane trip. They were amazingly lightweight when folded but provided sturdy support when fully extended. I find the light can be hit and miss going on but the cane itself was great. Product delivered as described.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Beware that the product photo is misleading. Tip is single pt
customer_reviews.text: Product Photo is misleading (close to false advertising)! It came with normal tip not the four points self standing tip shown! That’s an additional option ordered separately!
customer_reviews.author: Sllu

customer_reviews.title: love the little light
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, love the little light, takes a little muscle to take apart but very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: PFT

customer_reviews.title: Nice and  solid cane for the price
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of reviews about this cane a lot of them said the flash was junk from the start but I have to say mine has taken a beating from me dropping it multiple times and still works. Many of those drops on concrete. To me the flashlight was just a bonus anyways. Otherwise it’s a cane and it’s helping me get around much easier while I recover from surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding cane
customer_reviews.text: Nice folding cane with a built in flashlight for walking after dark
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is not for someone that has to use long periods. Great for travel or around the house
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice cane
customer_reviews.text: Great foldable cane it’s very strong when it all snaps together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Isreal

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great The cane gives great support. East to fold and store. The flashlight is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly Surprised by the quality compared to a similar cane purchased locally. the LED light works fine. the rubber tip is much more substantial. Works very good so far (2 weeks)
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Immediate assistance when needed
customer_reviews.text: Light so useful...avoiding street pitfalls, lighting mailbox when collecting mail in dark. Folds to get away from others at restaurant...sturdy...just so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA  A.  TROMBLY

customer_reviews.title: Always a lit pathway, even in the darkest areas.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband after his brain stem tumor removal surgery. Very helpful as he recovers.
customer_reviews.author: NYAZ

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my relative, she said it does not have a light.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great for air travel
customer_reviews.text: The light is a wonderful feature that makes good cane great
customer_reviews.author: CAJ

customer_reviews.title: I am returning it.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use it . The light doesn’t work. I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ines Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy
customer_reviews.text: I got one for the both of we took them to Disney they fit right in our carry on glad I got them
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Olson

customer_reviews.title: Light falls out easily.
customer_reviews.text: Light ,batteries falls out easily after dropping. cane handle fell off after a year use .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Folding cane
customer_reviews.text: This cane fit easily into my satchel. It is easy to set up for use (pretty much puts itself together!). While light and foldable, it is still strong and provides support when needed. Glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cane!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cane! My family was taken with it. So much so that I gave to my uncle and I will be ordering another. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat but doesn’t hold up well
customer_reviews.text: After using a few times the flared ends which connect one piece to the next became began flaring even more making it unusable
customer_reviews.author: robert strom

customer_reviews.title: Great folding cane
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is lightweight, easy to fold and extend. The light is a big plus and I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Helpful item
customer_reviews.text: This cane was easy to set up. We were able to easily adjust the height of the handle. And the addition of a light in the handles is very welcome/
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy & lighweight
customer_reviews.text: We brought this for my mother to help her after her knee replacement and she loves it. She wanted something portable but sturdy and lightweight and this checked every box. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gino Diridoni

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. Loves the light too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Winduvscry

customer_reviews.title: Like for travel at airport.
customer_reviews.text: Light works well. Sometimes does not come together real fast or straight when in folding. Does not seem as sturdy as my standard cane.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: There are way better walking canes than this one.
customer_reviews.text: It okay walking cane. Flash light does not work well and not well made.
customer_reviews.author: George Aloy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 94-year old dad and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Millie Riray

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad. He loves it. I think it looks stylish and the weights almost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: andre

customer_reviews.title: The 3-pad foot
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered canes with the 4-pad feet, so I have to return these as soon as I find out how.
customer_reviews.author: Derel S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVING MY NEW CANE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new cane, especially the light on the cane is very helpful. I use it to walk from my driveway to my house at night. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: nancy vander

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but week plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but I’ve only had it a few months and the handle broke off today while I was walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pulley

customer_reviews.title: A cane with a light is the answer to visiting unfamiliar homes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it and am taking in on a trip shortly. It is similar to one I had before but that one's light was not stable (poorly attached so it tended to flop). i trust this one will do better
customer_reviews.author: Fran Hamburg

customer_reviews.title: The led light on the cane.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cane, has a good light for my husband to see when walking to his truck in the morning before the security light will turn on in our drive way.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jolicoeur

customer_reviews.title: Handle light not operational
customer_reviews.text: Received the folding cane... light in handle does not work. Changed the batteries and made sure they were inserted correctly. I need the cane for an upcoming trip. Will return when back from trip.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fenley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use it near water.
customer_reviews.text: I need the light at night when I get up and go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ehrich

customer_reviews.title: The most important using at night cu’s of the LED light?
customer_reviews.text: I’m very like LED folding cane,like cu’s more space to keep it and you can put to your bag. Easy to used it and very lightweight to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Albuera

customer_reviews.title: Great cane
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who pulled a tendon in his ankle. He says the handle is more comfortable than another brand I bought for him. The LED actually is useful when getting up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: PK Linda

customer_reviews.title: Helped with recovery
customer_reviews.text: I had a total knee replacement and this was amazing in helping me get around.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cane
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cane to pack for travel for thanksgiving. Light weight but stable. Folds nicel. I paired it was quad rubber bottom so extra stable. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Owen

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight fails if dropped
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight works great until you drop it, no longer works but it is a lightweight and sturdy collapsible cane. I have two
customer_reviews.author: P. Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy Folding
customer_reviews.text: My hubby ordered this cane as a walking stick and he loves it. It’s very easy to unfold, put away and it travels well. He also enjoyed using the light during night walking.
customer_reviews.author: MzTee

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight is very usefull
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my dad... its great and very touch.... the build-in flashlight is awesone....
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Great support-post knee replacement for the interim until fully mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Item
customer_reviews.text: Love this cane, especially the LED light. Very useful. Great transaction with this vendor. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Donnelli

customer_reviews.title: Also to see better in rougher terrain
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient with the light for walking in the evening or early morning hours. Also to see better in rougher terrain. The bag included is only a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cane, but
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cane but the light doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's too high for short person.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the cane, but it's too high. Not able to adjust for 5'2" tall person.
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for travel backpack or carry on bag for those times you need a little help walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To long if your short
customer_reviews.text: Product not made for someone short who is 4ft and 11in
customer_reviews.author: donnaruth garber

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time for our trip!
customer_reviews.text: Eactly what we watnted. Seems like good quality and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Swick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and well secured. Nana loves her gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morton

customer_reviews.title: easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Convenience , easy to open. The light is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Impressive cane. Well made, very sturdy. Neat, polished, very nice looking. Flash light is a great feature. Nice handle with a good grip. You can’t beat the quality for the price.Easily could be worth more.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Like the cane very much but it failed on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the cane very much but it failed on the ability to have a way to have something feasible with the cane to hold the cane together when it collapses. More specifically, I was looking for a way to hold the cane together when it collapses in the airplane cargo area, what they sent it bulky and not what I would carry with me when traveling. I am still in search of something that would attach to the cane when needed that isn't bulky and hard that is easy to travel with. What Vive has doesn't fit the bill although the cane, the star of the show, is great!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kinman

customer_reviews.title: Useful but short lived
customer_reviews.text: I bought it only 4-5 months back and already the plug holding the batteries came loose twice. Now I have lost it as well and along with it the 2 AAA batteries. It is not securely attached to the cane; if by accident the cane falls the plug falls off from the cane. Also because it is of light metal, it easily gets distorted whenever it falls. Other than that it is a useful cane so long as it does not fall and does not loose the plug holding the two batteries. Once that happens the LED will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Madho Madhav

customer_reviews.title: Folding walking cane with light
customer_reviews.text: I have inflamed arthritis in my hip, very painful. My wife suggested I try using a walking cane. I found this one on eBay, the price was reasonable and it has a great gaurantee. I also liked the light in the handle which is very handy! My wife was right, the canes helps me a great deal. It is lightweight and the handle is comfortable in my hand. I found it easy to fold and it opens to full length almost automatically. For the price I am very happy that I bought it! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: David L Bowman Sr

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight breaks easily. Extremely  fragile
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cane especially because of the flashlight. Within the first week of use it fell from my fell from my hand onto a vinyl floor. Surprisingly the flashlight no longer works. I'm disappointed it didn't survive the relatively moderate drop which occurred under normal use conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother. She uses all the time, it is light weight, the light is nice, easy to fold. Only reason for a 4star is the clip to hold it to when folded is too hard to work for my mother. I actually found it awkward. So I put a heavy rubber band around too that she can easily use to keep it folded when setting out etc.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cane 4 months ago. Flashlight is no longer working. Barely ever used the feature!
customer_reviews.author: LJT

customer_reviews.title: Came apart in a week.
customer_reviews.text: The bungee cord folding works well, and the flashlight top was a cute idea for a week. Then one day the cane was leaning against a chair and fell to the floor. The flashlight, which contains a powerful spring, "explosively" disassembled itself, sending the screwcap, spring, insert, and batteries flying in all directions. I'm still not sure I found all the pieces. The cap was not loose. The threads that it screwed onto came loose from the plastic handle and the whole thing flew to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Novosielski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold (“close”), stow, open (unfold) and look debonair with.
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this folding cane with a light to conveniently keep in my car, it’s now in my suitcase for a trip to Ireland. I love it even though I don’t love needing to use it. 🙃 It’s plane black. Having a more colorful one would also be enjoyable to use. gg
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy and foldable cane
customer_reviews.text: Foldable and yet very sturdy when extended. Adjustable in height. Add to that the addition of a flashlight in the handle and it has been a good deal for the bride during her recovery.
customer_reviews.author: G in SC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The cane works perfectly. Great features including foldable option and LED light. Very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Nylon Bag
customer_reviews.text: There was a nylon bag to carry the folding cane that was advertised but not delivered with the package. The bag is what made me purchase from this distributor. My father liked that he could conceal the cane until he needed it with an easy to carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love how the cane folds and unfolds. Will be using it to maneuver around to the train station and bus stop as it starts to get dark at 5pm when I get off from work. I have low vision in the dark and this cane will help me avoid people love to bump into me.
customer_reviews.author: buffy59

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight makes it awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, compact, & convenient. I haven’t had issues with light as others complained.
customer_reviews.author: jessica p.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable collapsible cane.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and love the light at night. Was able to take on plane with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Tip.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I would change is the style of tripod on the tip. I prefer the one piece alighrly flexible kind that allows the cane to stand alone and if it falls, a foot tap rights it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen T. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Cane with built in flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Great cane! It does the job at a good price. The light is nice too. I use the link get to help find things I drop & to see when walking at night. I use the light more than I thought I would! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: love2live

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My husband is tall, this handles his weight just fine and the light is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine V. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to my father and it seemed like really working as we want! Good quality and light weight and the light is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z

customer_reviews.title: Folding cane.
customer_reviews.text: Have a bad back and had several surgeries. Use it to help take weight off lower back when walking. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vive LED Folding Cane with Light - Adjustable, Lightweight Collapsible Aluminum Walking Aid with Flashlight - Foldable Self-Standing Travel Stick - Men, Women, Senior - Easy Fold Up
feature_bullets: BRIGHT INTEGRATED LED LIGHTING: Easily illuminate low-light areas to safely navigate around obstacles and tripping hazards with the Vive LED folding cane. Integrated into the comfort grip handle, the bright LED light is repositionable, providing convenient, hands-free lighting when navigating in dim parking lots or walking to the bathroom in the dark. Easy to operate, the light switches on and off with a single push button located on the handle. The LED light operates on two AAA batteries which

COLLAPSIBLE COMPACT CANE: Providing a convenient option for those needing additional assistance, the LED folding cane smoothly and securely locks in place to provide extra stability while walking on any surface. Folding at four points along the cane shaft, the collapsible cane is compact, easily fitting into a purse, briefcase, carry on or wheelchair bag. The included secure clip ensures the cane remains folded while in storage.

LIGHTWEIGHT ADJUSTABLE ALUMINUM FRAME: Constructed with a durable, corrosion-resistant anodized aluminum, the folding cane is exceptionally lightweight yet sturdy, safely supporting up to 250 pounds. The cane is easily adjusted in one-inch increments from a minimum of 33” to a maximum height of 38”. Capped with a compact quad tip, the folding cane base pivots to provide exceptional traction and stability on any surface and is self-standing for greater convenience.

ERGONOMIC HAND GRIP AND STRAP: Ergonomically designed, the comfortable hand grip contours to the hand to reduce fatigue, prevent muscle cramping and relieve pressure on the wrist. The integrated wrist strap keeps the self-standing cane from falling to the ground if dropped.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
